channel.title: [Pi] Summoning - Dismissing an Npc
channel.description:
Title pretty much says it.
I have a basic summoning base setup (click pouch>spawns npc>npc follows you). [b]All I need now is the dismiss the npc.[/b]
In my case the dismiss option is the third click option for an npc. Therefore it would go in actionhandler.java under [code]public void thirdClickNpc(int npcType) [/code]
Although I added this code: [code] case 1408: if (c.summonId == 1408 && c.hasNpc == true) { c.hasNpc = false; c.summonId = -1; c.sendMessage("You dismiss your familiar"); } break;[/code] And tested it ingame but the npc doesn't "disappear" unless you log out.
So where do I add the code so I updates the npc and still allows for the third click option?
or
What do I add so it updates automatically in the actionhandler.java under thirdclick npc
